Interface Signal

All Known Subinterfaces:
Failure, Warning
public interface Signal
Generic signal, error or alert

      <T> T getProperty(@NotNull @NotNull String key, @NotNull @NotNull Class<T> cls)
      Retrieves the value of a property associated with Failure
      Type Parameters:
      T - class type
      Parameters:
      key - name that identifies the property
      cls - required class
      Returns:
      property value, or null if there is no property with that name and that class

      Retrieves the value of a property associated with Failure
      Type Parameters:
      T - property type
      Parameters:
      key - name that identifies the property
      defaultValue - value to return if the property is not defined
      Returns:
      property value, or defaultValue if there is no property with that name
